Description: M13 is an accelerator and venture capital firm that accelerates businesses and makes seed and early stage investments. The firm was founded in 2016 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.

Windforce Ventures is a venture capital firm that seeks to invest in early stage companies operating in the social media and mobile technology sectors. The firm was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in New York, New York.

Valor Equity Partners is a private equity firm based in Chicago, Illinois. The firm seeks to invest in the industrial products and manufacturing, infrastructure and industrial maintenance, value-added distribution, consumer and restaurants, energy services, healthcare and business services.

Goldcrest Capital is a venture capital firm based in Dallas, Texas. The firm specializes in seed, early stage and later stage investments in companies that operate in the real estate, information technology, enterprise software, analytic and internet services sectors.

Mr. Peter Thiel is the Founder at Thiel Capital. Mr. Thiel is also a Co-Founder of PayPal. He is a Co-Founder and and serves as a Partner at Founders Fund. He is the Founder at Breakout Labs. He is serving as a Board Member at Facebook. He is also a Co-Founder and serves as the Chairman at Palantir Technologies. He serves as Founder at Breakout Labs. He is a Co-Founder & also serves as Advisor at Valar Ventures. He is a Co-Founder and serves as Chairman at Mithril Capital Management. He has extensive experience as both an investor and entrepreneur. In 1998, he cofounded PayPal, an innovative payments company that he later sold to eBay for $1.5 billion. He was the first outside investor in Facebook, now the world's largest social networking hub with over a billion users. Peter established and funds the Thiel Foundation, which promotes freedom in all its forms. He sponsors the Committee to Protect Journalists, the Seasteading Institute, the Human Rights Foundation, and the Machine Intelligence Research Institute. Peter also created the 20 Under 20 Thiel Fellowship, which nurtures the tech visionaries of tomorrow. He holds BA degree in Philosophy and received JD from Stanford University. He is Board Member at Facebook. He is the Founder and serves as the President at Clarium Capital Management. Peter Thiel is also an Angel Investor.

Salesforce Ventures is the corporate venture arm of Salesforce.com. The firm prefers to make seed, early stage and later stage venture investments within the enterprise cloud sector. It primarily invests in companies built on the Salesforce Platform or are listed on AppExchange. It was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
Next Commerce Accelerator is a multi-corporate, commerce focused startup acceleration program, and seed investment fund.
